title: lil17th
author: lil17th
content: Hello everyone, the time has come when I sell my personal telegram channel - https://t.me/CoinSignalF- A new audience is growing every day- The reason for the sale is the opening of a larger project- After the purchase, you become the owner of the channel!Channel monetization:1. Traffic - you can use this channel to increase your second project, there is traffic - there is money!2. Selling advertising on the channel, from $ 100 per post, there are many different sites for selling advertising, as well as your personal audience to offer3. If you understand cryptocurrency, you can sell a VIP channel with forecasts and the like.Price: $1499If you buy today, the discount will be bigPayment in Cryptocurrency - PayeerI agree to use Escrow!Write in a telegram - https://t.me/lil17_th
